notes: Any general notes about this page

nav_01.question: Where is the main navigation menu?

nav_05.question: Where is the primary call-to-action button?

ext_01.question: What is the main heading or title of this page?

ext_05.question: Who is the author or seller?

int_05.question: What happens if I click the main CTA button?

sum_01.question: What is the main purpose of this page?

sum_02.question: Describe the page layout in 2-3 sentences.

sum_03.question: What are the main sections visible on this page?

acc_01.question: Which images lack alt text?
